title: 旧约 - 约伯记(Job) - 第 4 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 约伯记(Job) -- 第 4 章 ( 本篇共有 42 章 )

lineList.en: Then Eliphaz the Temanite answered and said,
lineList.cn: 毯螅人以利法回答说，

lineList.en: If we assay to commune with thee, wilt thou be grieved? but who can withhold himself from speaking?
lineList.cn: 人若想与你说话，你就厌烦吗。但谁能忍住不说呢。

lineList.en: Behold, thou hast instructed many, and thou hast strengthened the weak hands.
lineList.cn: 你素来教导许多的人，又坚固软弱的手。

lineList.en: Thy words have upholden him that was falling, and thou hast strengthened the feeble knees.
lineList.cn: 你的言语曾扶助那将要跌倒的人。你又使软弱的膝稳固。

lineList.en: But now it is come upon thee, and thou faintest; it toucheth thee, and thou art troubled.
lineList.cn: 但现在祸患临到你，你就昏迷，挨近你，你便惊惶。

lineList.en: Is not this thy fear, thy confidence, thy hope, and the uprightness of thy ways?
lineList.cn: 你的倚靠不是在你敬畏神吗。你的盼望不是在你行事纯正吗。

lineList.en: Remember, I pray thee, who ever perished, being innocent? or where were the righteous cut off?
lineList.cn: 请你追想，无辜的人有谁灭亡。正直的人在何处剪除。

lineList.en: Even as I have seen, they that plow iniquity, and sow wickedness, reap the same.
lineList.cn: 按我所见，耕罪孽，种毒害的人，都照样收割。

lineList.en: By the blast of God they perish, and by the breath of his nostrils are they consumed.
lineList.cn: 神一出气，他们就灭亡。神一发怒，他们就消没。

lineList.en: The roaring of the lion, and the voice of the fierce lion, and the teeth of the young lions, are broken.
lineList.cn: 狮子的吼叫，和猛狮的声音，尽都止息。少壮狮子的牙齿，也都敲掉。

lineList.en: The old lion perisheth for lack of prey, and the stout lion's whelps are scattered abroad.
lineList.cn: 老狮子因绝食而死。母狮之子也都离散。

lineList.en: Now a thing was secretly brought to me, and mine ear received a little thereof.
lineList.cn: 我暗暗地得了默示。我耳朵也听其细微的声音。

lineList.en: In thoughts from the visions of the night, when deep sleep falleth on men,
lineList.cn: 在思念夜中，异象之间，世人沉睡的时候。

lineList.en: Fear came upon me, and trembling, which made all my bones to shake.
lineList.cn: 恐惧，战兢临到我身，使我百骨打战。

lineList.en: Then a spirit passed before my face; the hair of my flesh stood up:
lineList.cn: 有灵从我面前经过，我身上的毫毛直立。

lineList.en: It stood still, but I could not discern the form thereof: an image was before mine eyes, there was silence, and I heard a voice, saying,
lineList.cn: 那灵停住，我却不能辨其形状。有影像在我眼前。我在静默中听见有声音说，

lineList.en: Shall mortal man be more just than God? shall a man be more pure than his maker?
lineList.cn: 必死的人岂能比神公义吗。人岂能比造他的主洁净吗。

lineList.en: Behold, he put no trust in his servants; and his angels he charged with folly:
lineList.cn: 主不信靠他的臣仆，并且指他的使者为愚昧。

lineList.en: How much less in them that dwell in houses of clay, whose foundation is in the dust, which are crushed before the moth?
lineList.cn: 何况那住在土房，根基在尘土里，被蠹虫所毁坏的人呢。

lineList.en: They are destroyed from morning to evening: they perish for ever without any regarding it.
lineList.cn: 早晚之间，就被毁灭，永归无有，无人理会。

lineList.en: Doth not their excellency which is in them go away? they die, even without wisdom.
lineList.cn: 他帐棚的绳索岂不从中抽出来呢。他死，且是无智慧而死。
